title: EIGENSTATE! I NEED THIS FONT UNBELIEVABLY BAD!
content:
I have seen that this font is off of the garage font list and basically anywhere else I have looked. Is there anywhere that anyone can suggest? This font is part of a few very important pieces of work and I lost it in a hard drive crash. Please help...without suggesting another font :)

Thanks!

 [‹ (x) Arabic style "M.A.R.occan nights" theme party script - various similar {gang}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081120081145/http:/www.typophile.com/node/19602 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Pharoah Sanders "Karma" late 60s album art - Shalom {Mike Y} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081120081145/http:/www.typophile.com/node/19612 "Go to next forum topic")
author: eddyj

comments.content:
You guys are professionals and don’t know to back up your fonts?  
Have we learned our lesson?  
Lessons are very important.

I got my lesson when my house was broken into. A lot of things can happen to data. This ribbing isn’t helpful now, but in the long run...

HELPFUL OR SYNICAL? THAT IS THE QUESTION.

This was one of the only fonts or files I did not have backed up, that is why I am asking here. I back up on a LACIE and on DVD with all my files. Along with this I post them on a server. This was one font that did not make it to any of these...crazy that it did not.

And yes I am professional, SIR.

RIB RIB

<cite>HELPFUL OR SYNICAL? THAT IS THE QUESTION</cite>

I have seen so many requests like this on the “amateur” boards, I sort of expected that the pros would know better. I guess the answer is a little bit of both.

Hypothetically, **if I had actually purchased that font** , I would expect that Garage fonts would replace it, at least at a small fee. If they were unable or unwilling to do that, personally I would have no qualms about going to where I know it can be found and getting it.
